definition: any of those hardwood trees of the genus Dalbergia that yield rosewood--valuable cabinet woods of a dark red or purplish color streaked and variegated with black
details:
noun
- any of those hardwood trees of the genus Dalbergia that yield rosewood--valuable cabinet woods of a dark red or purplish color streaked and variegated with black
= synonyms: rosewood tree
- hard dark reddish wood of a rosewood tree having a strongly marked grain
